translations: v.浏览；吃草（browse 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: What happens when one clicks on "Proceed to Checkout" on a website after browsing through their offerings?
sentences.translation: 当你浏览了他们的产品后，点击网站上的“继续付款”会发生什么？

sentences.sentence: Every web surfer, in the course of his or her browsing, has been forced to stop and perform this weird little task.
sentences.translation: 每一个互联网用户在浏览的过程中，都不得不停下来完成一个奇怪的小任务。

sentences.sentence: Most libraries offer browsing rooms where readers can relax on comfortable chairs and read current newspapers and magazines.
sentences.translation: 大多数图书馆提供浏览室，读者可以在舒适的椅子上放松，阅读当下的报纸和杂志。
